title: Dungeon Master - Cult & Craft
description: Dungeon Master â€“ Cult & Craft is a darkly captivating 3D dungeon management simulator where you reign as the master of an underground empire. Convert simple stickmen into loyal followers, mine precious resources, and grow a powerful cult beneath the surface. Keep faith high or risk losing control of your dominion. The goal of the game is to manage the dungeon, develop your Cult, and maintain power over your followers.
